description: Mock Twitter/X posts mentioning Peterbilt trucks

posts.content: Just took delivery of my new Peterbilt 579EV. The torque is insane and it's so quiet! Range is about 150 miles loaded which works for my regional routes. #579EV #ElectricTruck #Peterbilt
posts.author: TruckerMike_OO

posts.content: 6 months waiting for my 589 and still no delivery date. Dealer says allocation is tight. Anyone else dealing with this? Getting frustrated. #Peterbilt #589
posts.author: HighwayHauler22

posts.content: The 80-inch UltraLoft sleeper on my 579 is like a hotel room. Best investment I ever made. Home away from home for real. #OwnerOperator #Peterbilt #TruckerLife
posts.author: LoneStarTrucker

posts.content: PACCAR MX-13 just hit 800,000 miles on my 579. Original engine, just regular maintenance. These things are bulletproof. #Peterbilt #PACCAR #MillionMileClub
posts.author: VeteranDriver_Jim

posts.content: Where are the charging stations for the 579EV?? Love the truck but infrastructure is NOT there yet. Spent 2 hours finding a charger in Nevada. #EVTruck #ChargingDesert
posts.author: GreenFleetOps

posts.content: Dealer service has been a nightmare. 3 weeks waiting for a turbo on my 579. Parts availability is killing my uptime. Not happy. #Peterbilt #TruckRepair
posts.author: FreightKing_LLC

posts.content: Finally specced out my dream truck - 589 with Platinum interior in Ionic Gray. 6 month wait but it's going to be worth it! #Peterbilt589 #DreamTruck
posts.author: ChromeAndClass

posts.content: The new 579 dashboard layout is so much better than the old design. Everything is where you need it. Ergonomics on point. #Peterbilt #TruckInterior
posts.author: MidwestMover

posts.content: Check engine light again on my 2022 579. Third time this month. Dealer says it's a sensor but I'm losing money every time it derates. Frustrated! #Peterbilt #TruckProblems
posts.author: RoadWarrior_Steve

posts.content: Got the HVIP rebate approved for our 579EV fleet order. $120k back makes the numbers work. California leading the way on clean trucks! #ZeroEmission #579EV
posts.author: SoCalLogistics

posts.content: Peterbilt 389 is still the king of the highway. Nothing beats that classic look with modern reliability. #389 #ClassicTruck #Peterbilt
posts.author: OldSchoolTrucker

posts.content: SmartLINQ alert saved me from a breakdown. Got a service warning, pulled into dealer, they found a coolant leak before it became a problem. Technology works! #Peterbilt #SmartLINQ
posts.author: TechTrucker2024

posts.content: The air ride seat in my 579 is amazing for long hauls. No more back pain after 11 hours. Should have upgraded years ago. #DriverComfort #Peterbilt
posts.author: LongHaulLarry

posts.content: Ordered a 567 for vocational work. Dealer says 4 month wait. Better than the 8 months last year I guess. #Peterbilt567 #Construction
posts.author: HeavyHaulPro

posts.content: 579EV range anxiety is real. 150 miles isn't enough for my routes. Going back to diesel until charging infrastructure catches up. #EVTruck #RangeAnxiety
posts.author: PracticalTrucker

posts.content: Just toured the Peterbilt factory in Denton. Incredible to see how these trucks are built. Pride in every weld. #Peterbilt #MadeInAmerica
posts.author: TruckEnthusiast

posts.content: MX-11 fuel economy is impressive. Averaging 8.2 mpg on my regional routes. PACCAR knows engines. #Peterbilt #FuelEconomy #MX11
posts.author: EfficientFleet

posts.content: Bunk heater stopped working in my 579 sleeper. -10 outside and dealer can't see me for 3 days. This is unacceptable service. #Peterbilt #ServiceFail
posts.author: FrozenTrucker

posts.content: The 350kW DC fast charging on the 579EV is a game changer. 80% in under an hour. Now we just need more chargers! #579EV #FastCharging
posts.author: EVFleetManager

posts.content: Peterbilt dealer in Phoenix is top notch. In and out for service in 4 hours. This is how it should be everywhere. #Peterbilt #GoodService
posts.author: DesertHauler
